notes: intransitive; uses auxiliary essere; can use avere when transitive 'to raise'; past participle 'cresciuto'

also used as formal 'Lei'

example_sentence_english: As a child I was growing up in the countryside.
As a boy you were growing up in Rome.

example_sentence_english: As a girl she was growing up in Milan.
